name: Games by Songs
description:
‘Games by Songs’ was a 6 month period of intensive experimentation (supported by Creative Victoria) that I undertook about integrating pop-music (i.e. music with lyrics) into video games through collaborative songwriting and game design.

Collaborators included:

  • Designer/Programmer Cherie Davidson (Dreams, Untitled Goose Game)
  • Designer Jack Wilson (East Shade, TombStar)
  • Producer/Songwriter Dean Tuza (The Rubens, Stella Donnelly)

You can download:

  • Prototype 1: "Audio Manipulation"
  • Prototype 2: "Lyric Diver"
  • A .pptx of my project findings, which includes a list of game idea starters for games that incorporate lyrics/pop music.

A third prototype evolved into A Halloween Valentine which is currently in development.
